problem_text_cn: 如图,四边形ABCD是⊙O的内接四边形,若∠B=110°,则∠ADE的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the quadrilateral ABCD is the inscribed quadrilateral of ⊙O, if ∠B = N_0, then the degree of ∠ADE is ()
raw_answer:
解:∵四边形ABCD是⊙O的内接四边形,∴∠ADC+∠B=180°,∵∠ADC+∠ADE=180°,∴∠ADE=∠B．∵∠B=110°,∴∠ADE=110°．
故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题考查的是圆内接四边形的性质,熟知圆内接四边形对角互补的性质是解答此题的关键．
